short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new-tab page with the ideas that guests of the Tim Ferris Show would want to put on a huge billboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remember the billboard question Tim Ferriss always asks?

"If you could have a huge billboard anywhere, what would you put on it?"

Well, this extension brings 45+ inspiring answers to the new-tab window of your browser.

Enjoy!
